entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 5:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: S 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
